content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in vilnius city district court the case involved the dissolution of a marriage and the division of property between the parties the defendant was ordered to pay a stamp duty and professional fees the court referred to specific articles of the civil code regarding the division of property and the termination of the matrimonial community property the applicant filed a lawsuit seeking the dissolution of the marriage and settlement of related issues the court attempted to serve procedural documents to the defendant but was unsuccessful the defendant and third parties filed statements of defense the court considered evidence of a prenuptial agreement and granted the applicants application in full the court ordered the defendant to pay the applicants costs and the costs related to the service of procedural documents the court dissolved the marriage and identified the defendant as a personal debtor to various creditors the defendant was ordered to pay a sum of money to the state budget which will be collected by the state tax inspectorate

metadata.cost: 105.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 1'136.33 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant
